text: Create a roux over medium heat, with the flour and oil. Constantly stir to avoid lumping and potential burning. Carefully stir in the milk and continue whisking.  Sprinkle in the bacon bits. Continue to stir and cook until thickened. Remove the sauce pot from the heat. Add in the butter and seasonings. Serve hot! Refrigerate any leftovers.
